Articles.Content: Hi, I watched a video and in it the guy mentioned he installed a mod that fixed the fuel consumption bug in 0.16. I didn't see it in the add-on section, I was wondering if anyone could direct me to it (if it even exists :3)? Thanks!

This is what you are looking for:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/16439-0-16-0-Hacky-Fuel-Consumption-Bug-Fix?highlight=hacky+fuel+consumption
... I wouldn't hope by any chance you know how to install it? I thought I did it correctly but I still have the bug...
Take the part files from the mod and replace the ones you have. Don't delete the parts, just the one file. Then put the plug in in the plugin folder
